Title: I'm Sorry for You, My Friend
Plot: Rayna and Juliette get ready to perform in San Diego in their first arena concert on the same bill. Rayna finds that working without Deacon is too disruptive and makes an interesting proposal to Liam, while Juliette sends Sean a message through the press. Gunnar takes a road trip to Austin to visit his brother, and Scarlett tags along for the ride so she can catch Deacon's performance in Texas with the Revel Kings. Meanwhile Avery makes his move to sign with Dominic, and Teddy and Coleman's camp
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Kimberly Williams-Paisley, Wyclef Jean, Judith Hoag, David Alford, Ed Amatrudo, David Clayton Rogers, Tilky Montgomery Jones, Kourtney Hansen, Rya Kihlstedt, Michiel Huisman, Yara Martinez
